body_content.explanation: a northern constellation (= a group of stars) said to represent twins (= two brothers or sisters born together):
examples: As darkness falls, Gemini is just rising in the northeast.

body_content.explanation: the third sign of the zodiac, relating to the period from 23 May to 21 June, represented by twins (= two brothers or sisters born together), or a person born during this period:
examples: It was interesting to discover that the sales department contained a high proportion of those born under the sign of Gemini.
My mother is a talkative, sociable Gemini.
